statements: DELETE FROM FashionTrends WHERE year < 2020 AND trend_description IS NULL;
DELETE FROM FashionTrends WHERE season = 'Spring' AND year = 2021;
DELETE FROM fashion_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Summer Fashion';
DELETE FROM fashion_trends WHERE trend_id = 1 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trend_forecast WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM fashion_trends WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01');
DELETE FROM fashion_trends WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM trend_forecast WHERE forecast_date > '2022-06-01');
DELETE FROM HistoricalData WHERE trend_id = 1 AND year = 2021;
DELETE FROM TrendForecasts WHERE trend_id = 1 AND forecast_date = '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM HistoricalData WHERE year < 2020 AND sales_volume < 1000;
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE trend_id IN (SELECT trend_id FROM fashion_trends WHERE trend_category = 'Summer');
DELETE FROM collection_plans WHERE trend_id = (SELECT trend_id FROM fashion_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Fall Collection');
DELETE FROM fashion_items WHERE brand_id = 1 AND category_id = 2;
